CustomField.description: Anything closed prior to 2/4/19 set to 0, Industrial set to 0 Price Book Consolidation: Replaced ACV bookings formula reference with commissionable_ACV. Commisionable_ACV is a summary variable on the quote that captures all commissionable products (commissionable type is set at the product level). Data loaded historical ACV field for all deals closed prior to Q1FY22 GTMS-28931: Adding 1.06 as a multiplier for Carahsoft reseller partner.
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Historical_Commissionable_Dollars_ACV__c)), Historical_Commissionable_Dollars_ACV__c, IF( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Revenue Opportunity")), IF(Commission_ACV__c=0,ACV_Bookings_SOT__c,Commission_ACV__c), IF( TEXT(Selected_Payment_Type__c) = "Direct Annual", Commission_ACV__c * 1.20, IF( AND( TEXT(Selected_Payment_Type__c) = "Upfront Payments", TEXT(Configuration_Segment__c) = "Express" ), Commission_ACV__c * 1.30, IF( AND( TEXT(Selected_Payment_Type__c) = "Upfront Payments", License_Term__c < 60, TEXT(Configuration_Segment__c) = "Non Express" ), Commission_ACV__c * 1.25, IF( AND( TEXT(Selected_Payment_Type__c) = "Upfront Payments", License_Term__c >= 60, TEXT(Configuration_Segment__c) = "Non Express" ), Commission_ACV__c * 1.35, Commission_ACV__c ) ) ) ) ) )* Reseller_Partner_Multiplier__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Effective Q1FY20:
Samsara Express & Annual Payments = 120% of ACV Direct Monthly = 100% of ACV Direct Annual = 110% of ACV Upfront, 3-Year = 125% of ACV Upfront, 5-Year = 135% of ACV
CustomField.label: Commissionable Dollars ACV
